pages.text: $(c:/ftbquests open_book 2C9B55C8C05E20E2)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&rIn Craft to Exile 2, you can find &eDimension-specific Runes&r that can be used to slot into your gear, or craft powerful Runewords.$(br)There are &e7 of these Runes&r in total, and they can only be obtained from Dimension Bosses such as the Invoker or End Dragon.
&eOwd Rune&r $(2br) Hermit Abysswalker (&b5%&r),$(br) Invoker (&b10%&r),$(br) Frostmaw (&b15%&r),$(br) Grim Reaper (&b10%&r)$(br)
&&eNet Rune&r $(2br) Warped Mosco (&b10%&r),$(br) Wildfire (&b5%&r),$(br) Mother Lava Squid (&b5%&r),$(br) Wither (&b10%&r),$(br) Awful Ghast (&b15%&r),$(br) Nether Keeper (&b15%&r)

&eUnd Rune&r $(2br) Ferrous Wroughtnaut (&b10%&r),$(br) Umvuthi (&b10%&r),$(br) Tongbi, the Sculptor (&b10%&r),$(br) Forgotten Guardian (&b10%&r),$(br) Eel (&b15%&r),$(br) Mother of the Maze (&b50%&r),$(br) Ghost of Captain Cornelia (&b10%&r)$(br)
&eSid Rune&r $(2br) Warden (&b10%&r), Night Lich (&b15%&r),$(br) Nether Gauntlet (&b15%&r),$(br) Void Blossom (&b15%&r),$(br) Obsidilith (&b15%&r)$(br)
